org.qbroker.net

Class MulticastGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qbroker.net.MulticastGroup

  • public class MulticastGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    MulticastGroup connects to a multicast socket for publishing or receiving Datagram packets. It supports binding to a given network interface under Java 1.4.

    This is NOT MT-Safe.
    Author:
    yannanlu@yahoo.com
